name: BoardPilot
description: AI-powered project health analysis, status updates, and smart task prioritization for monday.com Sidekick.
longDescription:
BoardPilot brings AI project intelligence directly into monday.com Sidekick. Ask Sidekick to analyze your board's health, generate status updates, or prioritize tasks — and get instant, actionable insights powered by AI.

Three skills:
• Analyze Board Health — Score project health (0-100), identify bottlenecks, surface risk signals
• Draft Status Update — AI-generated status update with done/in-progress/blocked/upcoming sections
• Smart Prioritize — AI-ranked task list based on deadlines, blockers, and workload

features.name: BoardPilot Skills
features.description: AI project health analysis, status updates, and task prioritization

blocks.name: Analyze Board Health
blocks.description: Analyze a monday.com board to score project health (0-100), identify bottlenecks like overdue or stuck items, and surface risk signals with actionable recommendations. Use when a user asks about board health, project status, bottlenecks, risks, or overdue items.

inputFields.title: Board
inputFields.description: The name or ID of the monday.com board to analyze

blocks.name: Draft Status Update
blocks.description: Generate a polished project status update from a monday.com board's data. Includes completed items, in-progress work, blockers, and upcoming tasks. Use when a user asks to draft, write, or generate a status update or project report.

inputFields.title: Board
inputFields.description: The name or ID of the monday.com board to generate a status update for

inputFields.title: Audience
inputFields.description: Who the status update is for: 'team' or 'stakeholders'. Defaults to team.

blocks.name: Smart Prioritize Tasks
blocks.description: Analyze active tasks on a monday.com board and recommend a priority ranking based on deadlines, blockers, assignee workload, and priority labels. Use when a user asks to prioritize, rank, or identify what to focus on next.

inputFields.title: Board
inputFields.description: The name or ID of the monday.com board to prioritize tasks on
